snippet: Search and salvage workers were preparing on Tuesday to move debris of the AirAsia plane wreckage to allow divers to retrieve the cockpit voice recorder, the search coordinator said
abstract: Tonny Budiono, Indonesia Transportation Ministry's sea navigation director, confirms that rescue divers have recovered cockpit voice recorder from AirAsia Flight 8501; device will be analyzed in Jakarta.
lead_paragraph: Search and salvage workers were preparing on Tuesday to move debris of the AirAsia plane wreckage to allow divers to retrieve the cockpit voice recorder, the search coordinator said

headline.main: Indonesia: Divers Working to Retrieve AsiaAir Jet’s Cockpit Voice Recorder
headline.print_headline: Indonesia: Cockpit Voice Recorder of AirAsia Jet Is Retrieved, Official Says
